CreateBlockNodeRecords.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tan.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateBlockNodeRecords
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Records": "[{\"key1\":1,\"key2\":\"value2\"},{\"key1\":2,\"key2\":\"value2\"}]",
    "GroupId": "tan-xxxx",
    "NodeId": "b5fd85a5-033a-4f28-ab87-xxxx"
}
CreateBlockNodeRecords.title: 推送节点数据（支持多条数据推送，最大不超过100条）
